articles.title: Sun, sea and sandbox: Asian tourist spots try to reopen safely amid Covid-19 - The Straits Times
articles.description: Phuket got the ball rolling in July with its sandbox scheme and now other popular destinations are joining in.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
Phuket got the ball rolling in July with its sandbox scheme and now other tourist spots are joining in.

articles.title: China to face South Korea in FIBA Women's Asia Cup 2021 - CGTN
articles.content: Team China will play against Team South Korea on October 2 in the semifinals of the FIBA Women's Asia Cup 2021 following an impressive performance that placed the top-ranked Chinese team in the semif… [+1260 chars]

articles.author: Tasnim News Agency
articles.title: Chonburi Beats Saipa at Asian Women's Club Volleyball C’ship - Tasnim News Agency
articles.description: TEHRAN (Tasnim) – Thailand’s Supreme Chonburi defeated Saipa of Iran 3-1 (25-23, 22-25, 25-13, 25-13) at the 2021 Asian Women's Club Volleyball Championship Pool B on Friday.
articles.content:
Saipa will play Kazakhstans Altay and Rebisco Philippines on the following days.
Nakhon Ratchasima QminC of Thailand, Zhetysu of Kazakhstan and Philippines Choco Mucho are in Pool A.
The competitio… [+172 chars]

articles.title: Singapore heiress Kim Lim says yes to mysterious man after 'one big round' - AsiaOne
articles.description: Kim Lim has found love once again. The 30-year-old heiress is now engaged but her fiance's identity remains a mystery to the public. Sharing a photo of the elaborate proposal on Instagram, Kim wrote on Thursday (Sept 30): "After one big, big round (years), I'…
articles.content:
